title: Redo Landing/Login primary button dark-mode styling

requirements.summary: Restyle only the primary login <Button> on Landing/Login to a premium, prominent dark-mode treatment while preserving existing login behavior and label/disabled logic.
acceptanceCriteria: The only code change in LandingLoginPage is to the login button element (the Button currently rendered under the comment 'Login Button').
Button still triggers the existing login() handler on click and remains disabled when loginStatus === 'logging-in'.
Button label logic remains unchanged: shows 'Connecting...' while logging in and 'Get Started' otherwise.
Button has clearly improved dark-mode styling with visible hover/active feedback and a distinct disabled appearance.
No changes are made to logos, background image, tagline text, features grid, footer, routing, or authentication logic.

file_operations.description: Update ONLY the login button element under the 'Login Button' comment by adjusting the existing shadcn/ui <Button> props/className to add a modern premium dark-mode style (e.g., subtle dark gradient/high-contrast fill, stronger shadow or glow, focus ring, clear hover/active transitions, and distinct disabled styling) while keeping onClick={login}, disabled={isLoggingIn}, and the label expression exactly the same. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
